instructions:
In a 1 quart saucepan combine the vinegar, water, sugar, salt and spices. Simmer for 15 minutes and allow
to cool. In a 1 1/2 quart jar with a plastic lid combine the eggs, beets, onions and additional pickling liquid.
Refrigerate for at least 24 hours.
ingredients: 3 or 4 slices (3/16 inch) Vadalia or Spanish onion, quartered
name: Pickled Eggs With Beets And Onions
